recipeInstructions.name: Step 1
recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 400Â°F. On a sheet pan, toss chickpeas with salt, smoked paprika, and olive oil. Roast in the oven for 15 minutes until crisp.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 2
recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend all dressing ingredients until smooth: cashews, olive oil, lemon juice, capers, caper brine, dijon mustard, salt, water, garlic powder, and pepper until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, toss kale, pasta, roasted chickpeas, and vegan parmesan cheese until evenly combined. Drizzle the dressing over and toss until the salad is well coated.

recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt/pepper if needed, and serve immediately.
